reviews.sentence: The rooms were not that great. They are kind of old and you can tell that the hotel has not invested much money the maintenance and appearance of the rooms hallway etc.

Cheap but you get what you pay for. I get that this is a cheap hotel but at a minimum you expect the plumbing to work properly and the bed to stay together. The bathtub backed up while showering and by the end you would be standing in ankle deep dirty gross water. My husband sat on the corner of the bed he is not a big guy and it broke. Come to find out the frame was not held together by any screws or bolts. It was simply leaning together so all it took was displaced weight and the whole thing broke. They sent maintenance to fix the bed but the shower did not get better.

Changing over. The check in an check out was fantastic. There is so much to write in here I could write a small book. The staff was fine professional. The things I am talking about have nothing to do with the check process. There is so much maintenance that needs to be done to this hotel it is not even funny. I do not know how many maintenance workers they have working there but they need more. it is simply more issues than one person can handle. I had to remove a plastic bag from the smoke detector that someone who stayed in the room before me had wrapped around it so they could smoke in the room an it would not set the smoke detector off. This by the way is a violation of the fire code. Funny thing is some one on the house keeping staff should have noticed this. I am jus sayin. There are other issues but I do not have time to type it all.

Disappointed in dirty outdated room. Staff was very attentive. Motel was dirty. Rugs were ripped. Our sheets had not been changed before we arrived. Had to find some from another room around midnight when we wanted to go to bed. Housekeeping locked at night. Rest of room in need of repairs. missing electrical face plates etc.

Hotel needs some serious help and is worsening. we have stayed at this hotel 3 years in a row and will not again. The staff is nice and tries their best but can not keep the quality above water even for a bargain hotel. Our first room had half the power out so we got a second room. That room had a flashing phone that never stopped blinking brightly during our entire stay even though the front desk staff tried to shut it off a cracked toilet a TV remote that did not work the blow drier had fallen off the wall in the bathroom and a heater that only had the settings full A C and full heat. Garbage sat in the halls throughout our stay. The bathrooms do not have fans in them which leads to them always being damp and the ceilings are molding and discoloring. I am generally pretty tolerant since I realize I chose an inexpensive hotel so I could save money for stuff I really want to spend it on but this dropped below the bar even for me. The staff was friendly and tried their best to help within their power. The hotel is cheap about 10 15 night cheaper than other local big namesSerious maintenance is needed. They are not able to keep up with the simplest of things like replacing broken toilets or TV remote batteries. Greenville has a great childrens museum Dave Busters is nearby. Flour minor league baseball stadium is only about 20 minutes away.
Too much renovations going on damage in every room not in the best part of town.

In town for a dog show. They are getting ready for a remodel so our room was a combo of new and old. The important thing was that it was clean and there were plenty of towels. The front desk and the lady who ran the breakfast in the morning were so nice. They seemed excited about the remodel that was coming up. We were too busy to use the pool. We were there for 3 days and had no issues.

Needs updating. I have been to events at this building when it was managed by other hotel chains. As it aged it seems that no one wants to update it they just sell it. Put some money in it and there will be a better return on investment.

Like i was sayin. my fiance found a bed big on the inside of jacket on our 5th night staying there. If I did not have to work in Greenville the next i would be going home right now. The water stays in the shower till the next day and the police are constantly here along with the k9 unit. Smh oh well. U live and u learn. The front desk clerks are friendly as well as the maintenance man but this place needs to do a whole lot better for 7049 a night. AND ITS 2018 AND STILL NO CHANGE. THE UPKEEP RENOVATIONS OR MANAGEMENTBEST WESTERN YEA RIGHT. MORE LIKE DANGER INN.

I have mixed interactions with the staff but it is mostly been good and sometimes great. The hotel is utterly terrible. This is that place you think to yourself oh they must kill hookers and do drugs there. it is really cheap and they are allegedly about to undertake renovations.
Great. Wow. Newly remodeled so very new and nice. I liked the extras like a bottle of water and fruit to take with you. The price was very good for the hotel standard.

Surprisingly impressed. We stayed here while evacuating from hurricane Dorian. I was very impressed with this hotel considering the price and 2 star hotel rating. It was clean freshly remodeled great location and nice breakfast. My wife who is picky about hotels and upset I picked. 2 story hotel admitted it was a good find. No issues worth noting.
Exceptional. Friendly staff. Very nice updated rooms. Was a little hard to find the entrance.
Staff was polite. Hotel was clean and recently renovated. Exceeded expectation will be back. Breakfast was god standard no complaintsNothing.

Good. Beds were very comfortable. Rooms were newly remodeled clean. Housekeeping did not leave any bath towels on 2 of the 3 days they cleaned. Door to our room would not close unles we slammed it a couple times. Hotel was difficult to find as it is hidden behind a car dealership signage is very small.

It was suitable but not for more than two days. I loved the manager Bobie and the staff Royeta. They were very nice and friendly. I also loved the up to date renovations as far as the floors other added renovations. Bobie did fix the issue and accommodated us for one night and she also explained that the pest control was just out to get rid of the bugs. I did n’t like the attitude of the guest services rep Pam. She was not inviting at all. I rented two rooms and they both had ROACHES. After I was moved to a different room that was very nice and clean the power went out on one side so I was without tv fridge and microwave for one night along with my dinner going bad that was in the fridge.
Exceptional. New renovations are nice. I remember this place a few years ago. Totally different. Nothing to complain about.
Great bang for your buck. Hotel was not expensive at all rooms with very clean bed was unbelievably comfortable and a hotel was newly renovated.
The property is newly renovated but still needs some work.
Good. Updated facility convenient to 85Didn’t clean room after 1st day. Billed us for 4 days instead of 2. Security deposit 25 per day.
